remarks: Two functionals with the same kernel are the same up to a constant. (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2014.)
statement:
eqlkr.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
eqlkr.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
eqlkr.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` D ) $.
eqlkr.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
eqlkr.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
eqlkr.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` W ) $.
eqlkr $p |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ ( G e. F /\ H e. F ) /\ ( L ` G ) = ( L ` H ) ) -> E. r e. K A. x e. V ( H ` x ) = ( ( G ` x ) .x. r ) ) $.
$d .x. r $.
$d D r x $.
$d F x $.
$d G r x $.
$d H r x $.
$d K r $.
$d L x $.
$d V r x $.
$d W x $.
